name: In Between (itch) (Gabo6480, Kimchi, imervich)
description:
You're an Experimental Inter-Dimensional Trans-positioning Human (EIDTH), or for short EDITH.

After years of experiments you obtained a curious but special power, the interdimensional shift!
Tired of this life, you finally decide to escape your reality...


Mac and Windows version available.

Controls:

W - Up

A - Left

S - Down

D - Right

Space - Jump

E - Interact

Q or P - Interdimensional Shift

Credits: 

Animation, Art by
Abril Rios (Kimchi)

Level Design, Coding by
Gabriel Aguirre (Gabo6480)

Coding, Sound Design by
Iván Mervich (Ivandominus Rex)

This game was developed in 2 days as a game jam submission for the Global Game Jam hosted by Globant on January 2022 .
